welcome_message_body: Welcome to Binan, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of this historical city, known for its rich cultural heritage and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Binan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main international terminal for the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it now serves as the hub for all domestic flights at the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
